name: lifespeed
description: A blazing-fast, mobile-first journaling app - launch to typing in milliseconds

scripts.cap:sync: npm run bundle && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:sync:android: npm run bundle && npx cap sync android
scripts.cap:sync:ios: npm run bundle && npx cap sync ios
scripts.build:android: npm run bundle:prod && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.build:android:debug: npm run bundle:prod && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.build:ios: npm run bundle:prod && npx cap sync ios
scripts.dev:android: npm run cap:sync:android && npx cap run android
scripts.dev:ios: npm run cap:sync:ios && npx cap run ios
